sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' import Videos from './Videos' import { APIFetch } from '../utils/APIFetch' import '../styles/videoPlayer.css' //ReactPlayer - Accepts URL's const VideoDetail = () => { const [videoDetail, setVideoDetail] = useState(null); const [videos, setVideos] = useState(null); const {id} = useParams(); useEffect(() => { APIFetch(`videos?part=snippet,statistics&id=${id}`) .then((data) => setVideoDetail(data.items[0])) APIFetch(`search?part=snippet&relatedToVideoId=${id}&type=video`) .then((data) => setVideos(data.items)) }, [id]); if(!videoDetail?.snippet) return 'Loading'; return (

{videoDetail.snippet.title}

{videoDetail.snippet.channelTitle}

{parseInt(videoDetail.statistics.viewCount).toLocaleString()} views

{parseInt(videoDetail.statistics.likeCount).toLocaleString()} likes

) } export default VideoDetail
